title: Settings > Chat & Friends toggles - push to client?

embed.description: New photo ¬∑ Album by Jason Martin

body:
Just a general dev query.

The chat app kinda feels like a similar (same?) API that the game client was built on - does this mean the settings applied here on the app (offline friends + language filter) should also be mimicked on the client?

Also EULA might need a look at/update because I'm unsure if you want/permit us to decompile the app. üòÅ
